quiz.saying: I am the way, the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through Me.
The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
Before Abraham was, I AM.
The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom.
I am the bread of life. He who comes to Me shall never hunger.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and lean not on your own understanding.
Let not your heart be troubled; you believe in God, believe also in Me.
The LORD is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear?
I am the resurrection and the life. He who believes in Me will live, even though he dies.
Be still, and know that I am God.
Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.
For God so loved the world that He gave His only begotten Son.
I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down His life for the sheep.
Create in me a clean heart, O God, and renew a steadfast spirit within me.
Come to Me, all you who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of His hands.
I am the light of the world. Whoever follows Me will never walk in darkness.
I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
Father, forgive them, for they do not know what they are doing.
The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
Do not judge, or you too will be judged.
For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord.
I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in Me and I in you, you will bear much fruit.
The righteous will flourish like a palm tree; they will grow like a cedar of Lebanon.
Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened.
But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength.
Blessed are the poor in spirit, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer.
It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle than for a rich man to enter the kingdom of God.
Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged.
Peace I leave with you; My peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives.
If My people who are called by My name will humble themselves and pray.
Let the little children come to Me, and do not hinder them, for the kingdom of heaven belongs to such as these.
Cast all your anxiety on Him because He cares for you.
For where two or three gather in My name, there am I with them.
The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.
Greater love has no one than this: to lay down one's life for one's friends.
He who dwells in the shelter of the Most High will rest in the shadow of the Almighty.
Go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit.
The Lord is gracious and compassionate, slow to anger and rich in love.
Take up your cross and follow Me.
Wait for the Lord; be strong and take heart and wait for the Lord.
You are the salt of the earth. But if the salt loses its saltiness, how can it be made salty again?
The Lord is faithful to all His promises and loving toward all He has made.
I tell you the truth, unless you change and become like little children, you will never enter the kingdom of heaven.
This is the day the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it.
Heaven and earth will pass away, but My words will never pass away.
The Lord your God is with you, He is mighty to save.
Whoever believes in Me, as Scripture has said, rivers of living water will flow from within them.
Rejoice in the Lord always. I will say it again: Rejoice!
Do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself.
Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
If anyone would come after Me, let him deny himself and take up his cross daily and follow Me.
Taste and see that the Lord is good; blessed is the one who takes refuge in Him.
Whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers and sisters of Mine, you did for Me.
He will cover you with His feathers, and under His wings you will find refuge.
I have come that they may have life, and have it to the full.
The Lord gives strength to His people; the Lord blesses His people with peace.
If you love Me, keep My commands.
Be joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer.
I am with you always, even to the end of the age.
The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in Him, and He helps me.
Blessed are the merciful, for they will be shown mercy.
Give thanks to the Lord, for He is good; His love endures forever.
No one can serve two masters. Either you will hate the one and love the other.
The Lord is near to all who call on Him, to all who call on Him in truth.
For even the Son of Man did not come to be served, but to serve, and to give His life as a ransom for many.
Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength.
Watch and pray so that you will not fall into temptation. The spirit is willing, but the flesh is weak.
The name of the Lord is a fortified tower; the righteous run to it and are safe.
My sheep listen to My voice; I know them, and they follow Me.
The Lord has done great things for us, and we are filled with joy.
Unless I wash you, you have no part with Me.
Surely goodness and love will follow me all the days of my life.
You will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.
Every good and perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of the heavenly lights.
What good is it for someone to gain the whole world, yet forfeit their soul?
Blessed are those whose ways are blameless, who walk according to the law of the Lord.
